content: carry your latest project in style with this attractive tweed stitch knit bag designed in 100% cotton lily sugar n cream this easy-to-do pattern lets you practice simple slip_stitch knit tweed stitch and garter stitch edgings finish this sturdy carry-all by sewing in a zipper and carrying handle bag measures 11 w x 6 5 tall explore the breadth of colors available to make a version that reflects your tastes materials lily® sugar n cream™ solids 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m ombres 2 oz/56 7 g 95 yds/86 m contrast a white 00001 2 balls or 175 yds/159 m contrast b capri ombre 02747 1 ball or 85 yds/77 5 m measurements approx 11 28 cm long x 6½ 15 cm tall
